TopicTitle: Change the color of the kerbin orbital path and the minmus orbit path

Articles.Content:
I feel like the kerbin orbital color path would feel more suiting with a dark green color to it, instead of the light blue

And the Minmus weird lavender color It would look better with teal

Just a suggestion..
I think a dark teal color for Kerbin would work, whilst Minmus could be given a very bright teal. (Yes there is text there. Highlight it with your mouse to see)
